amendment.description: Amendment restricts all nuclear cooperation between the U.S. and North Korea until the President certifies to Congress that North Korea is complying with all international agreements pertaining to nuclear proliferation and has terminated its nuclear weapons program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 22, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 to restrict all nuclear cooperation with North Korea until the President determines and certifies to the Congress that North Korea is complying with all international agreements pertaining to nuclear proliferation and has terminated its nuclear weapons program.

action.text: Gilman amendment (A011) modified by unanimous consent. The modification add a section that defines terminology including "Agreed Framework", "I.A.E.A.", "North Korea", and "Joint Declaration on Denuclearization".
On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 305 - 120 (Roll no. 321).
